properties.areaDesc: Leeward Haleakala; Maui Windward West; Windward Haleakala; Molokai Leeward; Kohala; Maui Leeward West; South Big Island; Kahoolawe; Big Island North and East; Molokai Windward
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 18 at 3:44AM HST until February 20 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY FOR MOLOKAI
KAHOOLAWE INCLUDING PORTIONS OF MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND...

* WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 50
mph expected.

* WHERE...Molokai, Kahoolawe, West Maui, East Maui, and Upcountry
Maui. Portions of the Big Island including the Kohala
Mountains, Waimea and the Volcano region.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Winds this strong are capable of downing trees and
causing power outages. Motorists, especially those in high
profile vehicles, are urged to drive with extreme caution.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of at least 30 mph, or
gusts of at least 50 mph, are expected. Motorists should use extra
caution.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY
